QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Swamp of Sorrows!
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Trade Baron Silversnap at Bogpaddle.$B$BPersuade the trade baron to continue supplying our warriors with the weapons and munitions they require, no matter what it takes!$B$BTravel to the Swamp of Sorrows by following the road from the southeastern Burning Steppes through the Redridge Mountains and meet the trade baron at his seaside resort.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Trade Baron Silversnap at Bogpaddle in Swamp of Sorrows.
